page.title: 14Population in Chalton
page.content:
There are about{60 people}who live in Chalton.
{CENSUS:}The 1981 Census shows that the majority of people own their own home. The level of unemployment is particularly low. Most households contain all basic amenities. Very few of the current residents were born in the village.Most have a high standard of living owning two or more cars.
People moved to Chalton because they wanted to live in the countryside where it was quiet and had a sense of community and history. Families moved from London and Clanfield.
Everyone interviewed said they intended staying in Chalton for ever.
